trans-unit.source: This website uses cookies. Those have two functions: On the one hand they are providing basic functionality for this website. On the other hand they allow us to improve our content for you by saving and analyzing anonymized user data. You can redraw your consent to to using these cookies at any time. Find more information regarding cookies on our %1$s and regarding us on the %2$s.
trans-unit.target: This website uses cookies. Those have two functions: On the one hand they are providing basic functionality for this website. On the other hand they allow us to improve our content for you by saving and analyzing anonymized user data. You can redraw your consent to to using these cookies at any time. Find more information regarding cookies on our %1$s and regarding us on the %2$s.

trans-unit.source: These cookies are needed for a smooth operation of our website.
trans-unit.target: These cookies are needed for a smooth operation of our website.

trans-unit.source: Saves your consent to using cookies.
trans-unit.target: Saves your consent to using cookies.

trans-unit.source: Assigns your browser to a session on the server.
trans-unit.target: Assigns your browser to a session on the server.

trans-unit.source: With the help of these cookies we strive to improve our offer for our users. By means of anonymized data of website users we can optimize the user flow. This enables us to improve ads and website content.
trans-unit.target: With the help of these cookies we strive to improve our offer for our users. By means of anonymized data of website users we can optimize the user flow. This enables us to improve ads and website content.

trans-unit.source: Used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.
trans-unit.target: Used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.

trans-unit.source: Used to store the attribution information, the referrer initially used to visit the website.
trans-unit.target: Used to store the attribution information, the referrer initially used to visit the website.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.
trans-unit.target: Short lived cookie used to temporarily store data for the visit.

trans-unit.source: Contains a token that can be used to retrieve a Client ID from AMP Client ID service. Other possible values indicate opt-out, inflight request or an error retrieving a Client ID from AMP Client ID service.
trans-unit.target: Contains a token that can be used to retrieve a Client ID from AMP Client ID service. Other possible values indicate opt-out, inflight request or an error retrieving a Client ID from AMP Client ID service.

trans-unit.source: Used by DoubleClick (Google Tag Manager) to help identify the visitors by either age, gender or interests.
trans-unit.target: Used by DoubleClick (Google Tag Manager) to help identify the visitors by either age, gender or interests.

trans-unit.source: Contains campaign related information for the user. If you have linked your Google Analytics and Google Ads accounts, Google Ads website conversion tags will read this cookie unless you opt-out.
trans-unit.target: Contains campaign related information for the user. If you have linked your Google Analytics and Google Ads accounts, Google Ads website conversion tags will read this cookie unless you opt-out.

trans-unit.source: Used by Google AdSense to experiment with advertisement efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Used by Google AdSense to experiment with advertisement efficiency.

trans-unit.source: Used as unique user identifier. The cookie allows user tracking across many Microsoft domains
trans-unit.target: Used as unique user identifier. The cookie allows user tracking across many Microsoft domains

trans-unit.source: Saves anonymous user data from multiple website visits on multiple sites to test advertisement efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Saves anonymous user data from multiple website visits on multiple sites to test advertisement efficiency.

trans-unit.source: You already opted out of user tracking via your browser's Do-not-track function. We accept that. You can affect this via your browser's settings.
trans-unit.target: You already opted out of user tracking via your browser's Do-not-track function. We accept that. You can affect this via your browser's settings.
